NAEB ORDER FORMS
STATION_WISHES TO RECEIVE THE SERIES BOOKS ON REVIEW (S55-6).
(Check one?)_Please send 2 programs a week beginning with Issue 35
(August 28).
_Please send the complete package of 28 programs no later than
Issue 41 (October 9).
(Deadline: May 30, 1955)
(signed)
3/25/55
# # * #
(position)
*********************************.*****
STATION_WISHES TO RECEIVE THE SERIES HOW IT BEGAN (S55-7).
(Check one:)_Please send 2 programs every second week beginning with
Issue 35 (August 28).
_Please send the complete package of 15 programs no later
than Issue 44 (October 30).
(Deadline: May 30, 1955)
(signed)
3/25/55

ft***********************************.**
STATION_WISHES TO RECEIVE THE SERIES LANGUAGE IN SONG (S55-8),
(Check one:)_Please send 2 programs every second week beginning with
Issue 36 (September 4).
_Please send the complete package of 16 programs no later
than Issue 47 (November 20).
(Deadline: May 30, 1955)
